alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Platte County through 330 PM MDT... At 300 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Westview Circle, or 7 miles west of Wheatland, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Chugcreek, Lakeview North, Bordeaux, Westview Circle, Y-O Ranch and Slater. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 69 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Wyoming.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County
